name: Parking Vayreda Autocaravanas
title: (17001) Parking Vayreda Autocaravanas
description: The Parking Vayreda Autocaravanas is located in the Pasaje de Massaguer with location by means of the coordinates 41º59'03.2 "N and 02º48'50.1" E. Central and very well located to visit the city of Girona and its cultural heritage: the Cathedral, the neighborhood Jewish, the Arab baths, the Ramblas, the wall, the Devesa. It has 37 spaces with exclusive access for parking users, has personal assistance during working hours and is equipped with video surveillance and permanent lighting. There are intercom points inside and outside the area, to be able to communicate with the staff of the center. Parking users have differentiated health services for women, men and people with disabilities. The establishment allows you to spend the night and has a supply of drinking water, electric charge and evacuation, gray water and waste water and free WIFI service.

address.street: 14 Passatge Massaguer (Parking Vayreda Autocaravanas). Email: clientes@empark.com

title: (17003) Girona - 2 Carrer Barcelona
description:

quiet at night.
Pedestrians and moderate traffic in the morning.

It is front of Aldi, Lidl, and McDonalds (you can charge your phone there, go to the bathroom and have free wifi) I didn't have any problem during the night and the morning

title_short: (17007) Girona - 1 Carrer del Pont de La Barca
description: Free parking, 10 to 15 minutes walk from the historic old town. In the back area it is quiet, partly shady, with no through traffic and barely visible from the residential buildings in the neighborhood. For Wohmobile rather not suitable, but you do not stand out with a smaller vehicle (eg VW T4, Vito...) and has its rest. Occasionally someone walks by with their dog or visitors to the adjoining restaurant may use the car park (if this one still exists). For accompanying children there is a small playground within sight.

They also have a washer and dryer for pet clothes. Lots of free parking around, a large supermarket (Carrefour) and self-service gas station. Fast and efficient service, very good aroma in the clothes and the dryers with 20 minutes and at maximum dries everything very well.

title: (17242) Quart - Avda. de la Bòbila s/n
title_short: (17242) Quart - Avda. de la Bòbila s/n
description:
Free area for RVs no limit nger than 6.5 meters including water, grey water/potty emptying facilities  
much glass before the cleaning Place!!!
 5 spots for overnight parking (all free of charge). There are also recycling bins right next to the parking, plus a small neighbourhood "supermarket" a few blocks away. There's also a biking route nearby the leads to Girona in one direction (6 km) and Sant Feliu de Guíxols in the other (a tad further...35 km).

Very quiet at night, but a different story in the morning, as it's adjacent to a nursery school (you can guess the rest). Also worth noting: If you're coming from Girona and your navigator suggests the first exit to Quart, take into account that it involves going under a bridge with a 3m height limit, but there's another exit a few hundred metres further.

Please DO remember that this space is shared with local residents--it's actually the parking for the nursery school, so please be discreet and civil. Having spoken to the mayor (who I ran into by mere chance, and is very friendly and understanding), I can confirm that they don't mind us using some of the other spots not reserved for motorhomes, but 1) Only use the spots in the first row, next to the free facilities and 2) PLEASE do not park sideways: it's OK if you stick out a bit, but 3 RVs taking up 15 parking spots in NOT OK. It's rare to find FREE spots like this, so please be respectful, if not out of gratitude, for continuity's sake, or in the long run they'll end up being removed. Whether we choose to see it this way or not, we *are* indeed a community, our actions will surely affect those who come after us.

title: (17458) - 29 Carretera Nacional II
description: Service area Clean, gray and black waters Self-service car wash special for motorhomes. Ideal for cleaning the ceilings of the ac. Descaling and pressure cleaned foam system. Vacuum cleaner service.

name: Àrea d'Autocaravanes de l'Agrobotiga Mas Bes

description: Mas Bes Farm Area in Salitja, Vilobí d'Onyar (Girona). Routes on foot or by bike through the greenways of the municipality. At 900 meters is the hermitage of the Mare de Déu de les Fonts (17th century), at the foot of the La Crosa de Sant Dalmai volcano. Se - Granja Mas Bes offers a free visit to the Museum of the ancient crafts of the field. - Possibility of a guided tour of the farm. Saturdays and Sundays at 11:30 a.m. (ask for availability). Preparation of fresh milk, yogurts, mató and artisan ice creams. Preparation of cannelloni and fresh meat from our calves.

title: (17455) Caldes de Malavella - Carrer Solei
description: Not possible with a trailer! Very quiet area with 5 places 300m from the center, with water and electricity (electricity works according to the street lighting program). We were there and at 9am when the lights were off we had electricity. That alone, there are 4 connectors for the 5-seater, so if you're last you'll have to connect using another motorhome. For the last place you will need a 50 meter extension to reach the socket area. Be careful, the only problem is that your motorhome will be drowned in the droppings of pigeons and birds. At 100 meters you have a thermal hot spring. The inhabitants come to fill their bottles there to drink it without problem.

title: (17121) Corçà - 9 Avinguda de Santa Cristina

title: (17834) Pujarnol - 11 Carretera Pujarnol
description: Pujarnol tower. An ancient fortress dating back to the year 1200 from which you can see the sea, it currently houses a rural community immersed in the forest where 9 adults and 5 children live between the heart of Pla de l'Estany and the region of La Garrotxa. Particular place with a bell tower that was an old Torrevigía. We love having visitors! For this we have the following options: - Area for vans/motorhomes... - Camping area - Hostel (10 places) - During your stay whatever your option To sleep, you can enjoy a covered outdoor kitchen with fridge, barbecue, covered multipurpose room (former barn), solar showers, conventional shower, dry toilets distributed in different spaces, conventional and square bathroom. If you feel like it, you can join our community vegetarian/vegan lunches (at 1:00 p.m.) with products from our vegetable garden, chicken coop and Km0 cooperatives. You do NOT need to let us know if you would like to stay overnight in a van as we have plenty of space to accommodate you.

title: (17131) Rupià - 34 Carrer Indústria
description: Big parking in the beautiful village of Rupià, free but no services.

title: (17121) Corçà - 48 Carrer Major

title: (17468) Lareggae
description: The place is in the middle of the nature of Vilademuls, it is a place where you can breathe peace and tranquility, in the facilities there is a very original food truck inspired by reggae where you can eat some fabulous sandwiches (smash burger, vegetarian hamburger, suckling pig, falafel, assorted tapas) and listen to live music; from soundsystem, jam sessions, shows etc. There are toilets, a space to park campers and caravans. Fabulous saltwater pool.

title: (17100) Camp de futbol municipal Pere Plaja Girona
title_short: (17100) Camp de futbol municipal Pere Plaja Girona
description: A good alternative to the motorhome area for a daytime visit in case that the 4 places at the area are full or if the motorhome area is blocked off for the Friday morning market. There was lots of space to park to visit the market and town next to the football stadium.

title: (17240) Sant Miquel d'Aro - Unnamed Road
description: Very quiet place in the middle of nature, it is a parking lot for hiking and mountain biking. To get there, the road is paved and winding. We went up from romanya de la Selva. Some tight passages when crossing another vehicle but it was largely doable with our 7m cc. A 3 min walk you have the Puig d'arques weather station with a 360 degree view. Magnificent sunset. No services. Space for picnicking. Ideal with a dog. Weak 4g reception. Slightly sloping ground. Passage the day of mountain biker, hiker and some motorcycles.

title: (17133) Càmping Rural Montori
description: Rural campsite. Very calm. Swimming pool, playground, gas barbecues with volcanic stone, showers and toilets. 10-15 minute drive to the beach. About 30 plots, about 70m2, with 10A electrical connection and water. The pitches are designed for tent (+car), caravan (+car), van or motorhome camping. One animal only accepted.

Large car park alongside so perfect access.

title: (17240) Veïnat de Ganix - GIV-6612
description: Area of land in the middle of a forest of oaks with multiple paths. The ground is a little sloping but there is an area between trees that is ideal for putting the van on a level ground. It is near a secondary road where not many cars pass: we arrived in the mid-afternoon and left in the late morning, only two cars passed. Very quiet night.

title: (17240) Llagostera - GIV-6612
description: A nice and quiet spot on the side of a dirt road, only a few dog walkers in the morning. we stayed only 1 night.

title: (17240) Veïnat de Ganix - Unnamed Road
description: In the heart of a small quiet wood, you can place yourself just at the hollow of the bend in the track, a little remote in the woods. Quiet, peaceful, we spent one night there without any problem.

description: Church parking very quiet. Very calm. Next door there are two iron swings for children.

description: Next to the cemetery but very quiet, surrounded by nature. Very good access to

title: (17111) Vulpellac - Crta. C-66, km.8 (BP Vulpellac)
description: BP service station with terminal to fill and empty the water and with 4 parking spaces to spend the night with terminal to connect to the light. There is a supermarket with a bakery and all kinds of items, a washing area for motorhomes and a children's play area. Free WIFI. Terminals with tokens, with a consumption in fuel or in the supermarket, a free token

title: (17410) Sils - 23A Carretera Sta Coloma-palamos
description: Restaurant Parking without facilities - near a Consum supermarket and a gas station. Near the airport. We only stayed and are soon back, but very quiet night without surprises

title: (17240) Romañá de la Selva - 2 Carrer de Josep Maria Cama I Codina
title_short: (17240) Romañá de la Selva - 2 Carrer de Josep Maria Cama I Codina
description:
It is in Romañán de la Selva. The site is beautiful. It has no services and I think that is what makes it such a quiet place. It is the town of the writer Mercè Rodoreda, read La Plaza del Diamante which is a very very good work. In the town there are absolutely no services, just a fancy restaurant where foreigners go for pasta.
Max. 3.5 tonnes.

address.street: 2 Carrer de Josep Maria Cama I Codina

title: (17111) Vulpellac - Parc de l'U d'Octubre de 2017
title_short: (17111) Vulpellac - Parc de l'U d'Octubre de 2017
description: Parking day and night. We have spent a very quiet night, without the noise of the road from the area on the other side. The town is very pretty and very well preserved. From here you can make an excursion to the peratallada castle, by a very easy track, 8km round trip.

title: (17111) Vulpellac - 1 C-66
description: Free land parking. Shadow. Without services Gas station 50 meters with all services. Bar / restaurant in front of the parking lot.

title_short: (17831) Sant Martí de Campmajor - 23A Diseminado Sant Miquel de Campmajor
description: Car park where you can park Ac during the day without problems.

title: (17240) Santa Cristina de Aro - GIV-6612
description: It is a fairly flat, shaded, calm ground car park. There is no prohibition sign so we stayed there overnight and there was no problem. During the day there is just a little crowding because hikers and others stop here because there are dolmens, and dirt roads. No service.

title: (17240) Romanyà de la Selva - 28 Carrer de Lluís Esteva
title_short: (17240) Romanyà de la Selva - 28 Carrer de Lluís Esteva
description: Quiet viewpoint with a house nearby where there was no one. room for about 4 cars. There is no shadow. The road is fine but a motorhome I don't know if it could get there.

title_short: (17240) Romanyà de la Selva - Carrer de Felix d'Azua
description: At the end of a dirt road, end of the road, flat area, beautiful view of the Santa Cristina d'Aro valley (fireworks on the evening of August 4!). Ok for one night, but houses nearby. Very calm. Special dedication to T&M ...

title: (17430) Santa Coloma de Farners - Carretera de Farners
title_short: (17430) Santa Coloma de Farners - Carretera de Farners
description: Wonderful place for hiking and rock climbing right next to the road. Very quiet at night. Hikers and mountain bikers during the day. View over a beautiful valley. Perfect starting point for hikes. We felt very safe.

title_short: (17410) Sils - Aparcament de l'estació de tren, s/n

title_short: (17430) Santa Coloma de Farners - 63 Diseminado Diseminat

title: (17118) - Unnamed Road

description:
Very large parking lot with shade.
no service but spacious and safe.
3 km from the paying car parks of Parataillada. Good for a quiet night, there is the road but not very busy. No prohibition sign. Very good alternative for paid parking in tourist villages.

title: (17114) Ullastret - GI-644
description: Municipal cemetery, with beautiful views, quiet, near the road.

title: (17114) -
description: Parking for day and night. Tall and calm. There are no services or anything. I spent two very quiet nights there.

title: (17466) Garrigoles - 1 Diseminado Mas dels Frares
description:
COMARCA PARKING will be closed from 1 to 15 September inclusive.
-- 
4-hectare farm located in the middle of nature, where you can live with horses, and enjoy an environment full of many possibilities. With the sea 10 kilometers away, and various routes for walking and cycling. Availability of 12 places with electricity and water. The owner Alex, a nature lover, will welcome you and inform you of everything you need. Reservations are appreciated by Whatsapp. Entry limit time: 9:00 p.m.
Booking with Whatsapp.
Informations per email.

title: (17142) Verges - 27 Carrer de Girona
description: Pàrquing públic, in the locality of Verges, Holy Week fan la processó, dança de la mort and carnival, cal tastar the typical soup of the poble.

title: (17142) Verges - 5 Carrer Llevant
description: Quiet parking, next to the municipal sports field

title: (17483) Bàscara - 5 Carrer les Lleterias
description: The car park is part of the sports hall and the school, on weekends there is a large influx of people and on weekdays at school start and end times the car park is used to pick up and drop off children, as well as the school bus. park between lines.. thank you very much...

name: Càmping La Vall de Campmajor
title: (17831) Càmping La Vall de Campmajor
description: Small and family campsite. It has a small farm with rabbits and chickens and a playground for the little ones. Very quiet place and in a good area to visit both Banyoles and Fageda d'en Jordà.

title: (17852) Serinyà - C-66
description: Picnic area, next to the park of Serinya caves. Spent the night without problem, hidden from the road, and in the shade all day! To access it, go to the back of the park's coach parking lot, and go around the little bridge at the bottom of the meadow, behind are the picnic tables and the bivouac! Just a little noise from the road, and some cyclists on the small path of the edge ... On the other hand, to our dismay, the cave park is only open daily in July and August, if not the rest of the year open only on weekends ...

title: (17466) Vilopriu - GI-631
description: 360 degree view! Mega ♥ ️

title: (17142) Verges - 51 Carrer Baix Empordà
description: They leave you a hose to fill the tank, you have to ask for the tap key and the hose in the box, the gas station is very kind.

title: (17411) Vidreres - 120 Carrer Orient
description: Parking 200m from the center and starting point of several excursions.

title: (17466) Vilopriu - 21 Diseminado Afueras
description: 20min from les platges, but did not sit absolutely, not a cotxe, nor people, res de res. You dress them up, they are all bones, and they are ready to drink beer, just a few years ago, but it's molt i molt bé. Post i sortida de sol, top! Directed to the location (both abans and poor people) hi has several entrances that are also good.

title: (17411) Vidreres - Passatge Oriente
description: Ground parking at the edge of a field. Calm in small town.

title: (17114) Ullastret - GIV-6442

title_short: (17245) Santa Cristina d'Aro - Vias Verdes del Carrilet Girona

title_short: (17133) Serra de Daró - Carrer de la Font

Drinking water and recycling point.

Update: the water does not taste very nice after a couple of hours, like a chlorine taste so I do not recommend it for drinking.

title: (17411) Vidreres - 35 Carrer Maçanet
description:
***For reasons connected with the local Vidredes 2023 celebrations, the motorhome park will be closed from 25 August to 12 September ***. 


Ample car park where you can spend the night with water loading and black and gray water emptying services. Located near the center and the municipal sports hall. Starting point for excursions and with walking access to the various shops in the town.
